title: Multiplication (TEFC)
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Mathematics - Study and teaching
Mathematics, Science & Technology/Mathematics - Study and teaching
description: Episode of Series "Mathematics in the Infant/First School". This program introduces the 'sets of', approach to multiplication and the meaning of the multiplication symbol is also considered. Children discussing a dressing-up situation with their teacher use Cartesian cross products to complete the work on multiplication
